original_text: And you shall make its plates and dishes for incense, and its flagons and bowls with which to pour drink offerings; you shall make them of pure gold.
korean_text: 너는 대접과 숟가락과 병과 붓는 잔을 만들되 순금으로 만들며

sentences.original_text: And you shall make its plates and dishes for incense
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 분향을 위한 대접과 작은 대접을 만들고

sentences.original_text: with which to pour drink offerings
you shall make them of pure gold
